transcript: to open that bankbook to drive the new car to see the new refrigerator. I mean you can take these things out of a war, but when you drive the new car you have to know that it came out of the love of a man can have for a man.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: to open that bank book; to drive the new car; to see the new refrigerator.  I mean, you can take these things out of a war, but when you drive the new car, you have to know that it came out of the love a man can have for a man.
